title: Finally, someone is limiting the time kids spend on screens and it's ....TikTok?
description: Just ahead of the US National Unplugging Day, TikTok wants to help teens take TikTok breaks

title: This startup wants to use generative AI to write your marketing copy
description: A former Adobe CTO thinks AI can tailor itself to your business' voice.

title: PlugRAT Trojan disguises itself as Microsoft debugger to slip past your antivirus
description: Attackers are side-loading malware onto target devices, effectively bypassing antivirus programs.

title: Email and ransomware attacks dominated the cybercrime space last year
description: Employees still lack basic knowledge and expertise on cybersecurity, research finds.

description: A UK government watchdog has found a serious flaw with Nintendo and Microsoft’s Call of Duty deal.
